title: Ep. 943 - Trump Was Right About Another “Conspiracy Theory”
description:
A new DOJ report proves the Democrats’ spying on Trump went a lot deeper than anyone thought, Biden puts a leather-daddy dog fetishist in charge of our nation’s nuclear waste, and Facebook tries to sell the world on perpetual childhood during the Super Bowl.
Check out my shop page to purchase shirts, stickers, and books (one with words, one without) https://utm.io/uedo1
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Subscribe to The Daily Wire and stream our newest movie SHUT IN, already with a 100% critic score and a 97% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes: https://utm.io/uehf3
